meanings.sent1: The parkier playground had more swings than the other one.
meanings.sent2: The parkier park had greener grass and taller trees.
meanings.sent3: The parkier picnic area was so full of tables, it looked like a furniture store!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as parkier as a blooming garden in spring.
meanings.sent5: The parkier park was like a colorful painting come to life.

meanings.sent1: The weather was getting parkier as the sun started to set.
meanings.sent2: She wrapped herself in a parkier blanket to stay warm.
meanings.sent3: The parkier breeze made the leaves dance in the air.
meanings.sent4: His voice sounded parkier than usual in the chilly morning air.
meanings.sent5: The parkier day reminded her of cozy evenings by the fireplace.
